TITLE: Sending Notifications via XMLHttpRequest in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet demonstrating how to send notifications using XMLHttpRequest to the Notifier service endpoint. Includes setup of the request and formatting of notification data with custom source name.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/notifier-api/blob/main/docs/Installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var XMLHttpRequest = require("xmlhttprequest").XMLHttpRequest;
const request = new XMLHttpRequest();
...
const urlRaise = 'http://notifier:4201/notificationservice/notifications/ext/raise';
postMin = JSON.stringify({
  'notificationTypeId': '2',
  'eventText': 'KPI value under defined limit of ' + LIMIT_MIN,
  'assetId': ASSET,
  'notificationSource': 'KPI calculation app'
});
...
request.open('POST', urlRaise);
request.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json;charset=UTF-8");
request.send(postMin);
```

TITLE: Creating Notification Request Body in JSON for Notifier API
DESCRIPTION: This JSON object represents the request body required to raise a notification through the Notifier API. It includes the notification type ID (1=alert, 2=warning, 3=information), event text message, asset ID from Data Service, and the notification source identifier.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/notifier-api/blob/main/docs/Postman.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "notificationTypeId": "1",
  "eventText": "ALERT from Postman",
  "assetId": "549c3daa33cd4628b02c2e2745f54d80",
  "notificationSource": "Postman"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Request Body for Raising New Notification
DESCRIPTION: Sets up the request body with required parameters for raising a new notification, including type, text, asset ID, and source information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/notifier-api/blob/main/docs/FlowCreator.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
msg.payload = {}
msg.payload={
  'notificationTypeId': '3',
  'eventText': 'INFO from Flow Creator',
  'assetId': '<YourAssetId>',
  'notificationSource': 'FlowCreator'
};
return msg;
```

TITLE: Application Configuration JSON Schema
DESCRIPTION: Example configuration file showing the structure for MQTT credentials, tags, limits, and asset configuration
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/notifier-api/blob/main/docs/Installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
    "MQTT_USER":"edge",
    "MQTT_PASSWORD":"edge",
    "TAG_FAULTY":"GDB.process.numberFaulty",
    "TAG_PRODUCED":"GDB.process.numberFaulty",
    "LIMIT_MIN":"70",
    "LIMIT_MAX":"90",
    "ASSET":"549c3daa33cd4628b02c2e2745f54d80"
}
```

TITLE: Calculating Quality KPI in Industrial Edge Application
DESCRIPTION: This formula calculates the quality KPI percentage by subtracting the percentage of faulty bottles from 100%. It takes the number of faulty bottles divided by the total produced bottles, multiplies by 100, and subtracts the result from 100.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/notifier-api/blob/main/docs/Installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
quality [%] = 100 - ( <faulty> / <produced> * 100 )
```

TITLE: Setting Parameters for Notification Acceptance
DESCRIPTION: Sets the required notificationId, userId, and notificationSource parameters for accepting a notification. Includes user identification for tracking who accepted the notification.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/notifier-api/blob/main/docs/FlowCreator.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
msg.notificationId = {}
msg.userId = {}
msg.notificationSource = {}
msg.notificationId = "39";
msg.userId = "test@siemens.com"
msg.notificationSource = "KPI calculation app";
return msg;
```

TITLE: Setting Parameters for Single Notification Retrieval
DESCRIPTION: Sets the required notificationId and notificationSource parameters for retrieving a specific notification. The notificationId uniquely identifies the notification to be retrieved.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/notifier-api/blob/main/docs/FlowCreator.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
msg.notificationId = {}
msg.notificationSource = {}
msg.notificationId = "36";
msg.notificationSource = "KPI calculation app";
return msg;
```

TITLE: Setting Notification Source Parameter
DESCRIPTION: Sets the required notificationSource parameter for listing all notifications. This parameter identifies the source application of the notifications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/notifier-api/blob/main/docs/FlowCreator.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
msg.notificationSource = {}
msg.notificationSource = "KPI calculation app";
return msg;
```

TITLE: Setting Notification ID for Clearing
DESCRIPTION: Sets the required notificationId parameter for clearing a specific notification from the system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/notifier-api/blob/main/docs/FlowCreator.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
msg.notificationId = {}
msg.notificationId = "14";
return msg;
```
